backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, access control, 1:1 conversations, and message storage with helper functions for conversation lookup and authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence manifest mapping implemented features to source files, components, and test IDs for verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file including auth flow, messenger UI, hooks, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining a warm color palette for light and dark modes with global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document that loads the React app via main.tsx into the #root element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component handling authentication state, profile setup, and routing into the messenger UI.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting first‑time users to enter a display name and save their profile with validation and success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignedOutSc: Landing screen for unauthenticated users offering Internet Identity sign‑in with branding and loading states.
frontend/src/components/auth/UserIdentit: User menu showing profile name and principal with an option to sign out and clear cached queries.
Layout wrapper providing global header branding and containing the main application content area.
frontend/src/components/messenger/Conver: Header for an active conversation displaying its ID and offering a manual refresh action.
Displays the conversation sidebar, handling loading, empty states, and selection, and renders individual conversation items.
frontend/src/components/messenger/EmptyS: Provides simple UI components for when no conversation is selected or when a conversation has no messages.
frontend/src/components/messenger/Messag: Handles composing and sending messages with enter-to-send behavior and loading state.
Shows the active conversation with header, messages, loading/empty states, and message composer.
Renders a list of messages with styling for own vs. others’ messages and timestamps.
frontend/src/components/messenger/Messen: Top-level layout managing selected conversation and combining the sidebar and message pane.
frontend/src/components/messenger/NewCha: Form for creating a new conversation using a principal ID, with expand/collapse behavior and creation handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Hooks for fetching and saving the caller’s user profile and loading arbitrary user profiles.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for conversations, messages, creating conversations, and sending messages.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying base styling to body and borders.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider, and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and sessionStorage keys, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors sourced from CSS variables, custom animations, typography, container queries, and theme extensions.
project_state.json: Describes the overall project state and feature list for Shaheen Messenger, outlining implemented requirements and versioning.
